thread.title: Real Madrid's Isco will consider future before the summer | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Real Madrid's Isco will consider future before the summer | Daily Mail Online

author: Amitai Winehouse For Mailonline
title: Real Madrid's Isco will consider future before the summer | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share And Isco himself believes that he might have to quit if he does not get more first-team action. 'I'm calm. What worries me is to have minutes,' he told beIN Sports. 'A player's career is small. 'I'm happy here and would stay many more years. He said he was happy at Real and could stay but needed to play more minutes in the future 'From now until the end of the season, we will make a decision. It is my future at stake.' The former Malaga man has only made 11 starts in La Liga this campaign and played in the Champions League just once. Real top the Spanish top flight after 21 games and look likely to advance into the quarter-finals stage of the Champions League after beating Napoli 3-1 at home in mid-week. RELATED ARTICLES
